posts.post_content:
Aside from being a member of the popular Old Judge team, the Louisville Colonels, the N172 card of William "Farmer" Weaver is also on the Very Scarce list in The OJ Bible. Certainly not in tip-top condition, but if you're holding out for one in better shape, you'd probably better be prepared for a long wait.

Asking [STRIKE]$1750[/STRIKE]
Email to [url]kkkkandp@aol.com[/url]
